hero.title: Don't Pay for Software; Pay for Impact.
hero.subtitle: Kendra Labs is disrupting the traditional SaaS model to align our platform's cost directly with your verified business outcomes. We charge for value completed, not for seats or time spent.

flaw.title: The Flaw in the Per-Seat Model
flaw.description: Traditional SaaS pricing fails in the Agentic era. Since autonomous agents don't require seats, a per-seat model does not accurately reflect the value of the work performed. Kendra Labs moves the conversation from the cost of effort to the price of results.

model.title: The Outcome-Based Model
model.description: Our pricing scales only when your agents successfully complete verified business workflows.

points.label: Rationale
points.value: You only pay for Impact. If the agent does not execute the task to your SHIELD standards, you do not pay.

roi.title: The ROI Formula for the CFO
roi.description: We speak the language of the Chief Financial Officer by framing the value of an Agentic Workflow (Va) as a direct replacement or augmentation of manual labor cost:

definitions.meaning: Cost of Execution (API tokens + Kendra Platform fee)

roi.roiFormula: ROI = ((Manual Labor Cost × Time Saved) - Kendra Execution Cost) / Kendra Execution Cost
